member.name: M:opt.DataModel.TId.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares this instance to a specified object and returns an integer that indicates their relationship to one another
member.param: A object to compare to this instance
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes obj in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as obj. Greater than zero This instance follows obj in the sort order
